author_bio_1: A pioneer in the journey of conscious digital transformation, and an expert in addressing the challenges of digital distraction in our era. This book emerged not from academic studies, but from a deeply personal experience of regaining control over time, values, and goals.
author_bio_2: After years of feeling burnout and getting caught in social media spirals, Nawal decided to start her quiet revolution. This journey led her to research and delve into the mechanisms of digital addiction, resulting in practical tools and methodologies that are not just theoretical, but a proven and effective system for life.
